DOC.brief_summary: Aim study investigate impact orange juice consumption ( meal meal ) well sugar sweeten beverage ( SSB ) consumption ( meal ) glucose homeostasis antioxidative status .
DOC.brief_title: Orange Juice Consumption Glucose Metabolism Antioxidative Status
DOC.detailed_description: Duration study 3x three week include one wash-out week follow two week juice/SSB consumption free living condition . During wash-out week consumption orange juice citrus fruit restrict . During intervention week , participant ask eat three regular meal per day without snack . Intervention week ( ) orange juice consumption meal ( ii ) orange juice consumption meal ( iii ) SSB consumption meal . Daily energy intake orange juice/SSB 20 % individual energy requirement . Additional caloric beverage ( SSB , juice , coffee sugar/milk , alcohol ) allow . At begin end intervention phase insulin sensitivity antioxidative status assess .
DOC.criteria: healthy regular use medication , smoking , chronic disease , vegan/vegetarian diet , fructose intolerance , irregular eat behaviour ( le 3 meals/day )
